Home.title: NextJS Launchpad
Home.description: We created a boilerplate with essential tools and best practices so you can focus on building your NextJS project.

nextjs.name: Next JS
nextjs.description: Utilize the power of Next.js for server-rendered React applications

typescript.name: TypeScript
typescript.description: Enhance your development experience with TypeScript's static typing

tailwindcss.name: Tailwind CSS
tailwindcss.description: Rapidly build custom designs with Tailwind CSS's utility-first approach

eslint.name: ESLint
eslint.description: Enforce code quality standards and catch errors early with ESLint

prettier.name: Prettier
prettier.description: Keep your codebase clean and consistent with automatic code formatting using Prettier.

prettier_plugin_tailwindcss.name: Prettier Plugin Tailwindcss
prettier_plugin_tailwindcss.description: Automatic sorting of tailwind classnames using the official prettier plugin

prettier_plugin_sort_imports.name: Prettier Plugin Sort Imports
prettier_plugin_sort_imports.description: Sort imports alphabetically for better readability, especially in larger projects

husky.name: Husky
husky.description: Ensure code quality and prevent bad commits with pre-commit hooks powered by Husky

Home.footer_text: An Open Source initiative from CreoWis Technologies.
